text: "Again" is a 1993 song by Janet Jackson and is the third single from her fifth studio album Janet. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 2 in Canada, number 13 in New Zealand, number 17 in Finland, number 20 in Switzerland and the Netherlands, number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 5 in Sweden, number 29 in Germany, number 26 in Iceland, number 12 in Ireland and number 19 in Australia. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1994 and was used in the 1993 movie Poetic Justice. ==Track listing and formats== * US and UK CD maxi single (V25H-38411; VSCDG 1481) # Album version – 3:47 # Piano/Vocal – 3:48 # Instrumental – 3:50 # "Funky Big Band" – 5:25 * UK 7-inch single and Japanese 3-inch CD single (VS1481; VJDP-10212)Janet Jackson Again Japan 3" CD SINGLE (21637) Janet Jackson Again UK 7" Yellow Vinyl Single (192890) # Album version – 3:47 # Piano/Vocal – 3:48 * UK and Japanese CD single (VSCDX1481; VJCP-12021)Janet Jackson Again Japan 5" CD SINGLE (86871) Janet Jackson Again UK 5" CD SINGLE (32384) # Album version – 3:47 # Piano/Vocal – 3:48 # French version – 3:50 # "That's the Way Love Goes" (We Aimista Win Mix) – 5:38 ==References== Category:1993 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Janet Jackson songs
title: Again (Janet Jackson song)
